com.hp.jipp.pdl.util

Class TeeInputStream

  • com.hp.jipp.pdl.util.TeeInputStream

  • public class TeeInputStream

    For every byte read from source, also write to a duplicate.

    See Also:
    duplicate

    • Constructor Detail

      • TeeInputStream

        public TeeInputStream(@NotNull
                      java.io.InputStream source,
                      @NotNull
                      java.io.OutputStream duplicate)

        For every byte read from source, also write to a duplicate.

        Parameters:
        source - Closed when this stream is closed.
        duplicate - Destination for all bytes read from source, left open after this stream is closed.
        See Also:
        duplicate
